text: George and Amal Clooney famously stepped out for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's royal wedding back in May 2018. But why didn't the Hollywood couple make it Princess Eugenie and Jack Brooksbank's nuptials? When Harry and Meghan tied the knot, George and Amal had one of the best views of the couple in St. George's Chapel. Sitting in the left choir with Meghan's friends and family, the Clooneys made a big impact at the wedding, and it was thought that they'd also be putting in an appearance at Eugenie and Jack's big day. However, George and Amal were noticeably absent from the second royal wedding of 2018, which was attended by celebs including Demi Moore, Liv Tyler,
